attributes.additional_details: Enough is enough- the west cannot dither and act in fear. Russia must be isolated to the point of financial ruin. Short of putting troops on the ground it is the only measure that will show we are serious. It means a total ban on trade, R&D benefits, sport (including taking the world cup off Russia), cultural exchanges, to treat Russia as the international pariah they deserve to be- until Putin is either overthrown or deceased.
